nodes.text: Star Wars: I Am a Jedi
Star Wars: I Am a Jedi is a canon young-readers book. It was written by Christopher Nicholas and published by Golden Books on January 5, 2016.

Meet Luke Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda, and all the brave Jedi from the epic Star Wars space saga! Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this book is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages.
